metadata.title: SDQ
metadata.description: This section contains questions pertaining to the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ). It is a brief behavioural screening questionnaire about 3-16 year olds.

sections.description: Please make the selection that best fits your child: (SDQ)
